pharmacistServices.name: Clinical Pharmacy
pharmacistServices.description: Providing direct patient care to optimize medication therapy and promote health and disease prevention.

pharmacistServices.name: Medication Therapy Management
pharmacistServices.description: Conducting comprehensive medication reviews to ensure optimal therapeutic outcomes and minimize adverse effects.

pharmacistServices.name: Patient Counseling
pharmacistServices.description: Educating patients on medication usage, potential side effects, drug interactions, and adherence strategies.

pharmacistServices.name: Oncology Pharmacy
pharmacistServices.description: Specializing in chemotherapy and cancer treatment medications, including dosing calculations and supportive care.

pharmacistServices.name: Pediatric Pharmacy
pharmacistServices.description: Managing medication therapy for infants, children, and adolescents with age-appropriate dosing and formulations.

pharmacistServices.name: Geriatric Pharmacy
pharmacistServices.description: Addressing the unique medication needs of elderly patients, including polypharmacy management and fall-risk medications.

pharmacistServices.name: Compounding
pharmacistServices.description: Preparing customized medications by mixing, combining, or altering ingredients to meet specific patient needs.

pharmacistServices.name: Drug Information
pharmacistServices.description: Providing evidence-based drug information to healthcare professionals, patients, and institutions.

pharmacistServices.name: Pharmacy Management
pharmacistServices.description: Overseeing pharmacy operations, budgeting, regulatory compliance, and strategic planning.

pharmacistServices.name: Inventory Control
pharmacistServices.description: Managing medication stock levels, ordering, expiration tracking, and supply chain optimization.

pharmacistServices.name: Staff Training
pharmacistServices.description: Educating and mentoring pharmacy technicians, interns, and other staff on procedures and best practices.

pharmacistServices.name: Quality Assurance
pharmacistServices.description: Developing and monitoring protocols to ensure medication safety, accuracy, and regulatory compliance.

pharmacistServices.name: Immunization Administration
pharmacistServices.description: Administering vaccines and providing immunization consultations for preventive healthcare.

pharmacistServices.name: Critical Care Pharmacy
pharmacistServices.description: Managing complex medication regimens for critically ill patients in ICU and emergency settings.

pharmacistServices.name: Infectious Disease Pharmacy
pharmacistServices.description: Specializing in antimicrobial therapy, antibiotic stewardship, and treatment of infectious conditions.

pharmacistServices.name: Psychiatric Pharmacy
pharmacistServices.description: Managing psychotropic medications for patients with mental health disorders and behavioral conditions.

pharmacistServices.name: Ambulatory Care
pharmacistServices.description: Providing pharmaceutical care in outpatient clinics for chronic disease management and preventive care.

pharmacistServices.name: Nuclear Pharmacy
pharmacistServices.description: Preparing and dispensing radioactive materials for diagnostic imaging and therapeutic procedures.

pharmacistServices.name: Nutrition Support Pharmacy
pharmacistServices.description: Managing parenteral and enteral nutrition therapy for patients unable to meet nutritional needs orally.

pharmacistServices.name: Pharmacokinetics
pharmacistServices.description: Applying drug absorption, distribution, metabolism, and excretion principles to optimize dosing regimens.

pharmacistServices.name: Pharmacovigilance
pharmacistServices.description: Monitoring, detecting, and reporting adverse drug reactions to ensure medication safety.

pharmacistServices.name: Regulatory Affairs
pharmacistServices.description: Ensuring compliance with pharmaceutical laws, regulations, and licensing requirements.

pharmacistServices.name: Anticoagulation Management
pharmacistServices.description: Monitoring and adjusting blood thinner therapies to prevent clotting while minimizing bleeding risks.

pharmacistServices.name: Pain Management
pharmacistServices.description: Collaborating on pain treatment plans, including opioid stewardship and alternative therapies.

pharmacistServices.name: Sterile Product Preparation
pharmacistServices.description: Compounding injectable medications, IV admixtures, and other sterile preparations under aseptic conditions.

pharmacistServices.name: Medication Reconciliation
pharmacistServices.description: Comparing patient medication lists during care transitions to prevent errors and omissions.

pharmacistServices.name: Cardiology Pharmacy
pharmacistServices.description: Specializing in cardiovascular medications, including heart failure, hypertension, and lipid management.

pharmacistServices.name: Home Infusion Therapy
pharmacistServices.description: Providing IV medication therapy and support for patients receiving treatment at home.

pharmacistServices.name: Long-Term Care Pharmacy
pharmacistServices.description: Managing medication needs for residents in nursing homes, assisted living, and rehabilitation facilities.

pharmacistServices.name: Health Screening Services
pharmacistServices.description: Conducting point-of-care testing for blood pressure, glucose, cholesterol, and other health markers.

pharmacistServices.name: Prescription Verification
pharmacistServices.description: Reviewing prescriptions for accuracy, appropriateness, drug interactions, and contraindications before dispensing.

pharmacistServices.name: Chronic Disease Management
pharmacistServices.description: Collaborating with patients to manage conditions like diabetes, asthma, hypertension, and COPD.

pharmacistServices.name: Pharmaceutical Research
pharmacistServices.description: Participating in clinical trials, drug development studies, and outcomes research.

pharmacistServices.name: Poison Control Consultation
pharmacistServices.description: Providing guidance on toxic exposures, overdoses, and appropriate treatment interventions.

pharmacistServices.name: Transplant Pharmacy
pharmacistServices.description: Managing immunosuppressive therapies and medication regimens for organ transplant patients.
